# **iTek CFS - EFC**

## **Release Note**
---

## 1.0.0 (01-March-2021)
> This is an **intial** release of this application.

- New
    - RTC module for system date and time
    - Export transactions using 'itekcsv'
    - Can configure ARM controller locally
    - Logging system health status
- Fixes
- Improvements
